name: Tank Simulator (William Jacob)
description:
FOCUS, PLAN, ATTACK.

How long can you survive while an endless horde of enemy tanks comes to destroy you? Be sure to have shields, ammo and powerful defenses to wipe out your enemies! Prepare for the worst, accept whatever comes!

Tank Simulator is an action and strategy game. You control a tank and your goal is to survive as many rounds as you can while a horde of enemy tanks comes to end your game.

  • 3 scenarios to unlock!
  • Each scenario has a benefit and a detriment.
  • With each round of a match, new enemy tanks will appear and the more difficult the game will be!
  • A store that allows you to buy shields, bullets, defenses, etc.
  • Your progress in the match is automatically saved, allowing you to change scenarios without losing what was saved!

Some textures and sound effects were not created by me, the original creators are in the credits of the game, all credit is given to them, not to me.

Bugs, typos or any other problem, please send a email at: williamproductions8@outlook.com
